Nightshift was as well intuned with his senses as was Tucson.  He had learn=
ed it in Ninjabot training.  He could hear the hum of the stunner beam and =
like Tucson, he maneuvers quickly, with a quick squat, ducking himself lowe=
r than the beam, allowing it to go right over his head.  He was fast in his=
 motions, perhaps just slightly faster than Tucson, but it was still hard t=
o tell.  He wastes no time in transforming and alternates between SUV mode =
and Robot mode to manuever away from his captives.  

"Slag, talk about a b=
aaad day."  

Outside, now not far from the black fortress, going as fast a=
s his wheels will carry him, Tucson Prime rushes to get to his comrade who =
still struggles to get out of the fortress in one piece.  Rat Trap anxiousl=
y prepares for arrival as does Quickstride who loads up his cannons anticip=
ating a good fight.

"Y'know, I think you should let them know you're commi=
ng, Sir. That should stir things up a bit."

Tucson gives Quickstride's sug=
gestion deep thought.

" Actually, that's not a bad idea.  Why didn't I thi=
nk of that?"

Rat Trap grins, and points to his massive horn.

" Well, you'=
re a big truck, and big trucks have big loud horns.. C'mon let's hear it, I=
 bet that'll really shake 'em up."

Tucson picks up speed as he nears the f=
ortress.  And then, lets loose his horn, which blasts through the air, crea=
ting a vibrating effect within his radius.  He sounds the horn in long inte=
rvals, like an eighteen wheeler barreling into the next truck stop.  The ho=
rn's sound alone, mimics that of Optimus Prime.

Quickstride and Rat Trap h=
ang out the windows with weapons in hand.

" I've been waitn' a long time f=
or this! SO WHO'S GONNA RUN SCARED NOW HUH?!"

Rat Trap adds to the excitem=
ent as he hangs out Tucson Prime's driver's side window.

"HERE COMES THE C=
AVALRY!  HEY, WHEELS, C'MON, WARNING SHOT, WARNING SHOT!"

Tucson Prime lin=
es up his missile cannons for a warning ground shot, just a few miles away =
from the fortress, hoping that hitting the ground will be enough to grab Hy=
dra's attention.  He fires one missile at the ground, and then another, hit=
ting the land around it from in front and landing a missile which appears t=
o be guided, in back of the fortress, shaking up more than just the ground.=


Rat Trap dances in place.

"WHOO, HOOO! THAT'S WHAT I CALL A WARNING SHOT=
!"

Tucson doesn't say much, but now comes very close to the base.

"Guys, =
I have to let you off here, no offense."

The maximals nodd as they disemba=
rch from Tucson Prime's cab and no sooner do they get out, he transforms in=
to robot mode.  He stands outside, with missile chambers still smoking from=
 the warning shots.  As he's transformed, the missile chambers appear to be=
 attatched to his arms, which meant he could fire those at will if he wante=
d to.  Yet, he refrains as Optimus Prime would have done.  Rat Trap and Qui=
ckstride remain close, waiting for his next command.

" We wait here, I'm s=
ure someone is going to want to come out and investigate the premisis."

He=
 looks to a crater he had just left behind by the firing of the warning sho=
t to the ground.  He knew they'd come, it was only a matter of when.  In th=
e mean time he transmits to Lord Elder.

"Lord Elder, I'm at the dark fortr=
ess now.  If you see Kup, tell him to proceed with caution and remain behin=
d me, in case I need backup.  I don't want him risking his spark on my acco=
unt.  I started this, I need to finish it."

He looks to Rat Trap and Quick=
stride.

"You two, I'll need you out here for diversionary tactics duty.  T=
he more of a distraction you guys can muster, the better a chance we have o=
f getting Nightshift out of here in one piece."

They salute and do as told=
.  Tucson waits, standing strong, as the sun shimmers off his silver armor.=
  He takes the time to think, and on his mind, even more so than bringing H=
ydras to Justice, was the fact that Cyclonus had to pay for his crimes agai=
nst Rodimus.  He had stolen the energy of his matrix, taken a power that di=
d not belong to him, and Tucson Prime knew he was NOT going to stand for it=
. He grits his teeth, the anger was just too much to keep in.  He stares an=
grilly at the black fortress and then out of nowhere, with a voice as power=
ful as Optimus Prime's..

"CYCLONUS!"

His voice thunders like a high magni=
tude quake.

y in the middle of it rather than just

ot!" he raged, his autocannons moving back and forth.
